title: Boy, 9, wounded in accidental shooting in Terrytown: JPSO
content:
A 9-year-old boy accidentally shot himself in the leg while handling a pistol Tuesday evening (Sept. 13), according to the Jefferson Parish Sheriff's Office.
The boy was taken to University Medical Center in New Orleans where he is expected to recover, said Col. John Fortunato, spokesman for the department.
The shooting occurred about 4:50 p.m. at a home in the 2100 block of Esplanade Place in Terrytown. The boy's 10-year-old cousin called 911 to report the gun had discharged while the boy had been handling the weapon, Fortunato said.
No other information was available.
